title: Aren't we all looking for certainty? - Quora

response.answer_text: Deep down its fun we are looking for. Sounds kinda childish but its indeed true. Its the reason why we do everything.This tiny game of intellect going inside this puny human brain cannot possibly hold a viable pointer to the nature of absolute reality. We can hence say that the intellect gives only a successive approximation of reality, like Carl Sagan did. But we never stopped the intellectual inquiry because of that, its because we do find it enjoyable on the way. After all its not like there is some cosmic purpose or something.
And yet the universe is a mix of certain and uncertain. This makes us feel disconnected from the universe
